commit.message:
varpool.c (decide_is_variable_needed): Drop code checking TREE_SYMBOL_REFERENCED.

	* varpool.c (decide_is_variable_needed): Drop code checking
	TREE_SYMBOL_REFERENCED.

From-SVN: r159371

files.patch:
